names.pinyin: run jian hua yu xiao yan tang
names.english: antiphlogistic decoction for softening hard masses and removing blood stagnation
names.commonEnglish: Antiphlogistic Decoction for Softening Hard Masses and Removing Blood Stagnation

actions: Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, disperses swellings and improves the throat.
Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and benefits the throat.
With Shan Dou Gen, for severe pain, swelling and redness of the throat, teeth, and gums due to Internal Accumulation of intense Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
Strongly descends rebellious Qi.
Expels Phlegm, removes pathogenic water, descends Qi and stops vomiting.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, soothes irritability, cools the Blood and reduces abscesses.
Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi and stops pain.
Invigorates the Blood, dissolves Phlegm, resolves Stagnation, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
Disperses Blood Stagnation, regulates Qi, softens hardness, disperses tumors and removes toxins.
Promotes movement of Qi and alleviates pain.
Clears Heat, strongly relieves Fire toxins and reduces abscesses.
Clears Heat
Relieves Fire toxicity
Disperses swellings
Invigorates the Blood
Dispels Blood Stasis
Improves the throat
Stops pain
syndromes: Esophageal Cancer with intense thirst and sore throat due to Toxic Fire
